root.name: Bit.Trip Fate
root.description: Overview Bit.Trip Fate is an on-rails bullet-hellshooter developed by Gaijin Games. Released on October 25, 2010, it is the fifth entry in the Bit.Tripsaga and sees series protagonist, CommanderVideo, once again being controlled directly by players as they weave through numerous jungles of pixels to stay alive.Gameplay Bit.Trip Fate is much like its predecessor Runnerin that it uses an on-rails style of play. CommanderVideo's movement is limited to back and forth movements along a winding line of light known as "the vibe." The screen also automatically moves along slowly, revealing enemies and obstacles to vanquish, until CommanderVideo eventually encounters a bossat the end of the level.
